location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, on board the HC Cruizer Benaresto Captain Robert Taylor, Resident at Bussora [Basra]

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a copy of instructions (not present) provided by the Chief Secretary to the Bombay Government, which establish a closer connection between the Residencies at Bushire and Bussora [Basra].
